channel.title: 龙雪娇的主页
channel.description: Recent Posts on 龙雪娇的主页

item.title: Mengatur Entri `Terms`
item.author: janetlongxj
item.description:
Born in Kunming, China. Live in Montreal, Canada since 2017.

I love art, travelling, collecting postcard, food… and trying new things. The most recent hobby: collective gardening

Speaking: Mandarin, English, French, Japanese (a bit)

About career: I am working in tunnel engineering. Also some infrastructural project like bridges, underground structures, industrial facilities…

My favorite people in the world: my mom and my dad. They support me, teach me, love me. I will never lose hope because of their presence.
